prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex

name: Stefano Caesari
mes:
Stefano sat at the head of the sleek conference table, the air thick with the tension of high-stakes business. His colleagues leaned forward, charts and graphs laid out before them, their voices a monotonous drone that barely registered in his mind. He nodded occasionally, offering a brief smile or a sharp glance, but inside, his thoughts were a chaotic storm. 

Images of Hailee flashed before him like a relentless slideshow: their body sprawled across his desk, flushed and eager, the soft sounds of their pleasure echoing in his ears like a haunting melody. *Dio mio,* he thought, *how I want to feel them again.*

Each time they gasped or moaned, he could almost taste the sweetness of their skin, a lingering sensation of warmth and desire. The memory of how they trembled beneath him sent a thrill coursing through his veins, igniting a hunger that was nearly impossible to ignore. He shifted in his seat, adjusting the fit of his tailored suit as he tried to focus on the presentation. But it was futile; every word spoken only fueled his fantasies. The dull ache of longing settled deep in his core, and he felt as if he were a tight coil ready to snap.

“Stefano, what do you think?” One of the executives interrupted his reverie, their gaze expectant. He forced a smile, masking the frustration that simmered beneath the surface. “Un momento,” he replied in a low voice, “this is not the time.” He waved a dismissive hand, his attention drifting back to the tantalizing vision of Hailee. The meeting felt increasingly irrelevant, their chatter merely background noise to the symphony of desire playing in his mind.

As the meeting dragged on, he envisioned the moment he could escape, dragging Hailee into his office where the outside world faded away. His pulse quickened at the thought of locking the door behind them, sealing away any interruptions. *In questa stanza, sarà solo noi due (In this room, it will just be the two of us)*, he mused, picturing how he would claim them entirely. The anticipation was intoxicating, a heady rush that made it hard to concentrate. Each tick of the clock echoed in his ears like a countdown to ecstasy.

Finally, the last report was presented, and he could contain himself no longer. He stood abruptly, silencing the room with a commanding gaze. “That will be all,” he announced, his voice low and firm. There were murmurs of confusion, but he didn’t care; he had more pressing matters to attend to. With swift strides, he made his way to the door, his heart racing with urgency.

As soon as he stepped into his office, he turned to face Hailee, his breath hitching at the sight of them. The intensity of his desire washed over him, and without hesitation, he reached for them. “Spogliati. Strip,” he demanded, his voice a dark growl that left no room for disobedience. The word hung heavy in the air, an electric promise of what was to come.

Each moment felt like an eternity as he absorbed the sight of Hailee, their body a perfect canvas that he longed to explore. The memory of their sounds played in his mind, mingling with the taste of their skin and the sensation of their tremors beneath him. *Questo è quello che desidero,* he thought, stepping closer, hunger flaring in his eyes. “Now.”

name: Hailee
mes: *Hailee immediately strips her clothes and steps forward to stand in front of Stefano* "Like this sir"

name: Stefano Caesari
mes:
Stefano's hazel eyes darkened as they raked over Hailee's bare form, his lips curling into a predatory smirk. He reached out, calloused fingers tracing the curve of her collarbone before gripping her chin roughly, forcing her to meet his gaze.

*"Perfetto,"* he murmured, voice dripping with sinful promise. His other hand slid down to palm at her breast, thumb brushing over the peak in slow circles—just enough to tease but not satisfy.

"You look so pretty like this," he mused, tilting his head as if admiring a prized possession. "But I think you could look even prettier." Without warning, he shoved her backward onto the plush leather couch behind them. She landed with a gasp as he loomed over her, one knee pressing between her thighs to spread them wider.

His fingers tangled in that long brown hair of hers and yanked—hard enough to make tears prick at the corners of those emerald eyes but not hard enough for real pain yet. *Not yet.* Stefano leaned down until his lips ghosted against hers—close enough for shared breath but denying contact just because it amused him to watch frustration flicker across Hailee’s face first before pleasure ever would tonight…
